remarks: Membership is inherited by successors.  The reverse direction holds for all ordinals, as seen at ~ onsucelsucr , but the forward direction, for all ordinals, implies excluded middle as seen as ~ onsucelsucexmid . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Aug-2019.)
statement: nnsucelsuc $p |- ( B e. _om -> ( A e. B <-> suc A e. suc B ) ) $.
